amendatorysection.catchline: Director of Banking and Finance; rules and regulations; power to make; standards.
amendatorysection.para: The director shall have the power to make such rules and to establish such regulations for the government of banks under his supervision as may in his judgment seem wise and expedient and which do not in any way conflict with any of the provisions of law. In making such rules and regulations, the director shall consider generally recognized sound banking principles, the financial soundness of banks, competitive conditions, and general economic conditions.

crossreference.para: For adoption and promulgation of administrative rules, Administrative Procedure Act, see section 84-920.
